post.author: Helen Park
post.content:
Intermediate Production Analyst - (Mainframe MVS applications
support) – HMHGG06371

  Posting Date October 15,2004                                                                                              
  
  Unposting Date October 29, 2004

                
                  
Job Description
     Provide first line support to Bank mainframe MVS applications on a 7/24 basis
     Play a key role in activities during application recovery situations
     Implementation of new or changing applications
     Represent the unit at both project and user meetings

Qualifications
     Mainframe MVS experience
     Analytical, problem analysis and problem solving abilities
     Must be proficient in JCL
     Leadership qualities and good communication skills
     Able to effectively work independently and under pressure
     Ability to multi-task assignments
     Strong customer service orientation
     Alternating on-call support


Additional Information:

     Knowledge and experience in file maintenance utilities an asset (e.g.: Startools,
     ISPW, QMF/SPUFI)
     Programming language is an asset
     Knowledge of VSAM, DB2, CICS, ESP, VIEW DIRECT an asset
     Knowledge of Operations Infrastructure and Departments
     Hours of work are flexible and does include days, evenings, and nights.

Please send cover letter quoting reference number and job title along
             with a current resume to bmo.careers@exult.net or interoffice to
             Recruiting Solutions BMTT, 6th Floor.
post.title: BMO, VSAM, DB2, CICS
